Building a Safer Digital Future with AI, Made in Canada

At CyberXYZ, based in Vancouver, Canada, we're dedicated to creating a safer, simpler digital future by combining advanced AI with human expertise. Our innovative security solutions leverage cutting-edge Generative AI to protect critical data and digital assets, making enterprise-grade cybersecurity accessible and manageable for organizations of all sizes.

Our History

Founded in 2024 by two security experts in Vancouver, CyberXYZ emerged from a fundamental understanding: modern security challenges require the perfect blend of artificial and human intelligence. This insight drives our AI-enhanced approach to security solution design, setting us apart in the cybersecurity landscape.

Global Expertise, Local Innovation

Expertise

Over 6 years of experience in Microsoft's CIRT and DART teams, handling critical incidents across the globe.

Global Reach

International expertise spanning Germany, Canada, US, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Jordan, and beyond.

Industry Experience

Former Accenture security consultants and industry experts.

Security Experts

Diverse team of security professionals from leading global enterprises.

Our AI-Powered Security Solutions

We specialize in:

  • AI-Enhanced Vulnerability Assessment through our APT Exploit Tool
  • Advanced DFIR with Generative AI Analysis
  • Cross-Platform Security Solutions with AI Threat Detection
  • Enterprise-Grade Security Tools powered by Machine Learning
  • AI-Driven Threat Hunting and Pattern Recognition
  • Predictive Security Analysis using Advanced AI Models

Innovation Through AI

Our security solutions leverage state-of-the-art AI technologies to:

  • Detect emerging threats with predictive analysis
  • Automate security assessments with intelligent scanning
  • Enhance incident response with AI-powered forensics
  • Provide actionable insights through machine learning
  • Combat AI-based threats with advanced detection systems
